name: CUBE 332
description:
CUBE 332 - fascinating runer. In which, you need to get from point A to point B, using only the mouse and one button. Simple, is not it?
But in reality everything is much more complicated! The game develops the speed of your thinking and reaction, helps you feel like a real winner in gaining any success. The game also has a beautiful graphics, which in combination with its other features will definitely give you a new, fascinating way of killing time.
Can you simultaneously control the cube and destroy the obstacles with the mouse?

Features:
Complex and dynamic gameplay
The cursor is used to clear the path
Non-standard game process
Hardcore
